name: Alien (Hebdogiciel)
overview: A shoot'em-up created by Pascal Lin and published in Hebdogiciel N°026 (06.04.1984). You are in command of the starfighter. Your mission is to repel the invaders without getting hit by the bombs. For each ship repelled you get10 points.To continue, type on C. In this game you only live twice! At 50 points a surprise awaits you.
